The Quranic researcher is based on that no one will be able to.This sentence is a detention of a sentence (we have created the human being in a linguist [Al -Balad: 4]).And the understanding is used in storms and error.And Zaid (what is calculated) is returned to the human being, not a referral, and from the effects of life in the sense (we have created the human being in a linguist [Al -Balad: 4]) that some of those who made it (what is wrong with) Some of what the human being is prevented, like my father, the most beautiful, and he is sacrificed on a way.
